Articles.Content:
I have only recently started playing outside sandbox mode, and so the techtree is all new to me. I know when science was first released there was lots of talk of alternative tech trees, and I rather like the idea of having to fly probes before you can do manned flight. Is there a mod that rearranges the tech tree in this way. I have seen Better than Starting Manned, but is seems to do lots of other things as well such as adding life support and I am quite happy with TAC lifesupport as it is.

Is there a simple mode that just redoes the tech tree?

You're looking for this: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/93759-ATC-Alternative-Tree-Configurator-18-9-V0-5

There are three tree options currently. Sadly no new nodes can be added.
There's tree loader and its pretty good stuff but it isn't .25 yet
